metadata.dc:author: Medina Moya, José Luis
metadata.dc:description: The author demythologizes some arguments which blamed the victim and he works on the path to rediscover practical knowledge in nursing in the sense that a nurse becomes a "constructor" or a "maker" of knowledge and not a mere applicator of knowledge.
metadata.dc:title: Redescubrir el saber práctico de la enfermera. El difícil equilibrio académico y profesional en la España "Pre-Europea" (III).
[Rediscovering practical knowledge in nursing].
